name: PoopFacts
0:
”Alexa, open Poop Facts.”
”Alexa, ask Poop Facts for a fact.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: poop facts
des:
Funny, informative poop facts from our toilet to yours! From prehistoric poop to poop in space, this skill will teach you more about the exciting world of excrement than you'd ever admit you wanted to know.

Impress your friends with newfound poop knowledge, groan-worthy puns, and potty humor from the number one number two skill on Alexa.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
